subject: Fwd: ...
body:
It had been tidy before, but now there were 
dirty dishes stacked on every available surface; it looked to Paul as if every 
one in the house must be here.If Misery Chastain had been a real person, he 
knew he might very well have been called upon "to aid the police in their 
inquiries", as the euphemism went.It had been tidy before, but now there were dirty dishes stacked on 
every available surface; it looked to Paul as if every one in the house must be 
here.If Misery Chastain had been a real person, he knew he might very well 
have been called upon "to aid the police in their inquiries", as the euphemism 
went.
